  <title>EEZ_Land_v3_202030</title>
  <abstract>This dataset combines the boundaries of the world countries and the Exclusive Economic Zones of the world. It was created by combining the ESRI world country database and the EEZ V11 dataset.

To create sovereign areas for each country.</abstract>
